t: Connolly Music Company Acquires Magic Rosin® Brand
s: June 26, 2018 - With Connolly acquiring the brand, it will distribute the product more widely through music stores and provide customer support. "We are thrilled to have Magic Rosin as a member of the Connolly family of best-in-class brands," states Jake Connolly, President of Connolly Music Company.

t: Brands - Magic Rosin - Connolly Music
s: Sarah hand-poured all Magic Rosin in her kitchen until spring of 2012 before moving to a small workshop in NE Minneapolis. In 2016 Sarah entrusted the Magic Rosin company to Connolly Music, a family business that specializes in the marketing and distribution of bowed strings and accessories.

t: About Connolly Music
s: Connolly Music Company and Thomastik-Infeld have been working together to bring the finest strings to the US for over 50 years. In addition to being the source and guiding force behind Thomastik-Infeld, Connolly is also the US connection to König & Meyer, Revelle, Magic Rosin, The Realist, Jargar Strings, Boveda and a selection of several other best-in-class brands...
